ComicInfo.Summary:
Harlan Ellison's Dream Corridor is a comic book series published by Dark Horse Comics. All of the stories are adapted from works originally written by Harlan Ellison. Each issue includes many pages of interstitial sequencing written by Ellison, drawn by Eric Shanower, and a new short story by Ellison, written around the cover of each issue.
*Story Titles* Anywhere But Here, With Anybody But You (prose) by Ellison S.R.O. by Niles and JK Snyder III I Have No Mouth, And I Must Scream part 2 (prose) by Harlan Ellison I Have No Mouth, And I Must Scream part 2 by John Byrne Enter The Fanatic, Stage Center by Petrucha and Sutton
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/harlan-ellisons-dream-corridor-2-harlan-ellisons-d/4000-249534/
